title: MVPD Authorized Premium
custom_preconds:
- App is launched and pointing to QA server
- ASG "live" Postseason test game is set up on day user is viewing
- Tester is logged in with an MLB Premium/MVPD Authorized account 

2017 accounts can be found here: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/AAA/ASG+Activation+Flow+2017+-+Fox#ASGActivationFlow2017-Fox-2017MLBPremiumAccounts(QA&Prod)

__NOTE: AS OF 6/21/17 only mlb_asg3@mlb.com HAS BEEN CONFIRMED AS LINKED TO MVPD__
custom_steps:
1. Activate test ASG Game Tile
2. Launch ASG NATIONAL (US) video feed
custom_expected: Video feed launches and plays as expected

title: MVPD - Not Authorized Premium

- ASG "live" Postseason test game is set up on day user is viewing
- Tester is logged in with a Premium NON-LINKED (not MVPD Authorized) account

custom_expected: Game launches to fullscreen playback.

title: Archive: Premium MVPD
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has access to a Premium account listed here:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/AAA/ASG+Activation+Flow+2017+-+Fox#ASGActivationFlow2017-Fox-2017MLBPremiumAccounts(QA&Prod)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user signs into a Premium account that has Access to the All Star Game
AND the user tries to access a ASG game that has been archived
custom_expected: THEN the user should be able to watch the ASG video feed

title: Archive: Premium
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has access to a Premium account listed here:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/CDANDMSFT/MLB.TV+-+2017+Connected+Devices+Test+Accounts
custom_steps:
WHEN the user signs into a Premium account that doesn't have Access to the All Star Game
AND the user tries to access a ASG game that has been archived
custom_expected: THEN the user should get video playback.

AND launches the ASG International (INT) video feed
custom_expected:
tvOS:
THEN the user cannot launch the feed and is shown a configurable message directing user to try a different feed.

2017 Message from http://qa.mlb.com/device-config/v1/mlbtv-messages/en-US/tvos-v2.json

Content Blacked Out
This feed is not available in your region. Please try a different feed.

--

Roku...
